caption: The boy Christ in the temple, radiating divine wisdom as scholars marvel and His humble parents stand witness.
image_prompt: A young Christ seated in the temple, His face glowing with serene authority, surrounded by aged scholars who lean in with expressions of awe and contemplation. In the background, Mary and Joseph stand at the entrance, their simple garments contrasting with the grandeur of the temple. Mary's eyes reflect quiet reverence, while Joseph's stance conveys protective humility. Soft golden light filters through the columns, casting a sacred glow over the scene, symbolizing the transition from earthly guardianship to divine purpose.
